languages.text: "Прискорбная обеспокоенность о собственном кармане — тем более в такие темные времена. Под угрозой — мир Империума со всеми ресурсами, что потенциально могут на нем находиться". {n}Хейнрикс презрительно кривится.{/n} "Все на Фтоне IV, что не будет отмечено скверной и не подпадет под категорию запрещенных Священной Инквизицией объектов, ты можешь реквизировать. Меня {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}волнует проблема{/d}, заставившая Эмелину выйти на связь, а не богатства мира".

"Your concern for your own pockets is deplorable, especially in such dark times. An Imperial world is at stake here, along with all the resources it may hold." {n}Heinrix's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "You may requisition everything on Phton IV that has not been touched by corruption and does not fall under the category of objects prohibited by the Holy Inquisition. My {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}only concern{/d} is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."
languages.original_text: "Прискорбная обеспокоенность о собственном кармане — тем более в такие темные времена. Под угрозой — мир Империума со всеми ресурсами, что потенциально могут на нем находиться". {n}Хейнрикс презрительно кривится.{/n} "Все на Фтоне IV, что не будет отмечено скверной и не подпадет под категорию запрещенных Священной Инквизицией объектов, ты можешь реквизировать. Меня {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}волнует проблема{/d}, заставившая Эмелину выйти на связь, а не богатства мира".

traits.locale_text: "Your concern for your own pockets is deplorable, especially in such dark times. An Imperial world is at stake here, along with all the resources it may hold." {n}Heinrix's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "You may requisition everything on Phton IV that has not been touched by corruption and does not fall under the category of objects prohibited by the Holy Inquisition. My only concern is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."

My only concern is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."

"Your concern for your own pockets is deplorable, especially in such dark times. An Imperial world is at stake here, along with all the resources it may hold." {n}Heinrix's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "You may requisition everything on Phton IV that has not been touched by corruption and does not fall under the category of objects prohibited by the Holy Inquisition. My {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}only concern{/d} is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."

languages.text: “如此动荡的时代，你却只在乎自己的口袋，这实在是令人遗憾。这件事情关系到整个帝国世界的安危，也关系到那颗行星上的一切资源。”{n}海因里希轻蔑地翘起了嘴角。{/n}“菲顿四号星上，但凡是还没有被腐化侵蚀，也不属于审判庭禁止事项之外的资源，都可以归你所有。我并不在乎那个世界的财富，我{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}唯一担心的是{/d}艾米莉娜为什么会联系我。”
languages.original_text: "Your concern for your own pockets is deplorable, especially in such dark times. An Imperial world is at stake here, along with all the resources it may hold." {n}Heinrix's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "You may requisition everything on Phton IV that has not been touched by corruption and does not fall under the category of objects prohibited by the Holy Inquisition. My {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}only concern{/d} is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."

traits.locale_text: “如此动荡的时代，你却只在乎自己的口袋，这实在是令人遗憾。这件事情关系到整个帝国世界的安危，也关系到那颗行星上的一切资源。”{n}海因里希轻蔑地翘起了嘴角。{/n}“菲顿四号星上，但凡是还没有被腐化侵蚀，也不属于审判庭禁止事项之外的资源，都可以归你所有。我并不在乎那个世界的财富，我只担心艾米莉娜为什么会联系我。”

languages.text: «Su preocupación por su cartera es deplorable, especialmente en tiempos tan aciagos. Hay un mundo Imperial en peligro, y eso incluye con todos sus recursos». {n}Heinrix hace una mueca de desdén.{/n} «Puede requisar todo lo que haya en Phton IV que no esté corrupto ni prohibido por la Santa Inquisición. {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}Solo me preocupa{/d} el problema que ha obligado a Emelina a contactar conmigo, no las riquezas del planeta».
languages.original_text: "Your concern for your own pockets is deplorable, especially in such dark times. An Imperial world is at stake here, along with all the resources it may hold." {n}Heinrix's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "You may requisition everything on Phton IV that has not been touched by corruption and does not fall under the category of objects prohibited by the Holy Inquisition. My {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}only concern{/d} is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."

traits.locale_text: «Su preocupación por su cartera es deplorable, especialmente en tiempos tan aciagos. Hay un mundo Imperial en peligro, y eso incluye con todos sus recursos». {n}Heinrix hace una mueca de desdén.{/n} «Puede requisar todo lo que haya en Phton IV que no esté corrupto ni prohibido por la Santa Inquisición. Solo me preocupa el problema que ha obligado a Emelina a contactar conmigo, no las riquezas del planeta».

languages.text: 「陛下がご自身の利益のみを心配するというのは嘆かわしいことです。特にこのような暗い時代において。今、インペリアルワールドは危機に瀕しています。その惑星が保有するあらゆる資源も同じです」{n}ハインリックスの唇が反意を示すように丸まる。{/n}「プトン・IVにある汚職に触れられておらず、神聖なる異端審問庁の禁止物の範疇に該当しないものはすべて取得することができます。我が{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}唯一心配{/d}していることは、エメリナさんが我に連絡せざるを得なかった問題そのものであり、惑星の富ではありません」
languages.original_text: "Your concern for your own pockets is deplorable, especially in such dark times. An Imperial world is at stake here, along with all the resources it may hold." {n}Heinrix's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "You may requisition everything on Phton IV that has not been touched by corruption and does not fall under the category of objects prohibited by the Holy Inquisition. My {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}only concern{/d} is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下がご自身の利益のみを心配するというのは嘆かわしいことです。特にこのような暗い時代において。今、インペリアルワールドは危機に瀕しています。その惑星が保有するあらゆる資源も同じです」{n}ハインリックスの唇が反意を示すように丸まる。{/n}「プトン・IVにある汚職に触れられておらず、神聖なる異端審問庁の禁止物の範疇に該当しないものはすべて取得することができます。我が{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}唯一心配{/d}していることは、エメリナさんが我に連絡せざるを得なかった問題そのものであり、惑星の富ではありません」

languages.text: « Votre soif inextinguible de richesse est affligeante, surtout en des temps aussi troublés. Un monde impérial est en danger, ainsi que toutes les ressources qu'il pourrait abriter, {n}rétorque Heinrix avec une grimace de mépris.{/n} Vous êtes en droit de réquisitionner tout ce qui se trouve sur Phton-IV et qui n'a pas été touché par la corruption ou n'entre pas dans la catégorie des objets prohibés par la Sainte Inquisition. Cependant, ma {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}principale préoccupation{/d} est le problème qui a poussé Emelina à me contacter, et non pas les richesses de ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "Your concern for your own pockets is deplorable, especially in such dark times. An Imperial world is at stake here, along with all the resources it may hold." {n}Heinrix's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "You may requisition everything on Phton IV that has not been touched by corruption and does not fall under the category of objects prohibited by the Holy Inquisition. My {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}only concern{/d} is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."

traits.locale_text: « Votre soif inextinguible de richesse est affligeante, surtout en des temps aussi troublés. Un monde impérial est en danger, ainsi que toutes les ressources qu'il pourrait abriter, {n}rétorque Heinrix avec une grimace de mépris.{/n} Vous êtes en droit de réquisitionner tout ce qui se trouve sur Phton-IV et qui n'a pas été touché par la corruption ou n'entre pas dans la catégorie des objets prohibés par la Sainte Inquisition. Cependant, ma principale préoccupation est le problème qui a poussé Emelina à me contacter, et non pas les richesses de ce monde. »

languages.text: "Eure Sorge um Eure eigenen Taschen ist verdammenswert, zumal in dunklen Zeiten wie diesen. Eine imperiale Welt steht hier auf dem Spiel, zusammen mit all ihren Ressourcen." {n}Heinrix' Lippen kräuseln sich verächtlich.{/n} "Ihr dürft auf Phton IV alles an Euch nehmen, was nicht von Verderbnis befallen ist und unter die Kategorie von der Heiligen Inquisition verbotener Objekte fällt. Meine {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}einzige Sorge{/d} ist das Problem, das Emelina veranlasst hat, mich zu kontaktieren, nicht der Reichtum der Welt."
languages.original_text: "Your concern for your own pockets is deplorable, especially in such dark times. An Imperial world is at stake here, along with all the resources it may hold." {n}Heinrix's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "You may requisition everything on Phton IV that has not been touched by corruption and does not fall under the category of objects prohibited by the Holy Inquisition. My {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}only concern{/d} is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Sorge um Eure eigenen Taschen ist verdammenswert, zumal in dunklen Zeiten wie diesen. Eine imperiale Welt steht hier auf dem Spiel, zusammen mit all ihren Ressourcen." {n}Heinrix' Lippen kräuseln sich verächtlich.{/n} "Ihr dürft auf Phton IV alles an Euch nehmen, was nicht von Verderbnis befallen ist und unter die Kategorie von der Heiligen Inquisition verbotener Objekte fällt. Meine einzige Sorge ist das Problem, das Emelina veranlasst hat, mich zu kontaktieren, nicht der Reichtum der Welt."

languages.text: "Böylesi karanlık zamanlarda bile kendi cebini düşünüyor olman gerçekten üzücü. Bir İmparatorluk dünyası ve içindeki tüm kaynaklar tehlike altında." {n}Heinrix'in dudakları tiksintiyle kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Phton IV'te bulunan, yozlaşmanın dokunmadığı ve Kutsal Engizisyon tarafından menedilen nesneler kategorisine girmeyen her şeye el koyabilirsin. Benim {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}derdim{/d} Emelina'yı benimle irtibata geçmeye zorlayan sorun neyse o. Dünyanın zenginlikleri değil."
languages.original_text: "Your concern for your own pockets is deplorable, especially in such dark times. An Imperial world is at stake here, along with all the resources it may hold." {n}Heinrix's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "You may requisition everything on Phton IV that has not been touched by corruption and does not fall under the category of objects prohibited by the Holy Inquisition. My {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}only concern{/d} is whatever problem forced Emelina to contact me, not the world's riches."

traits.locale_text: "Böylesi karanlık zamanlarda bile kendi cebini düşünüyor olman gerçekten üzücü. Bir İmparatorluk dünyası ve içinde barındırdığı tüm kaynaklar tehlike altında." {n}Heinrix'in dudakları tiksintiyle kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Photon IV'te yozlaşmanın dokunmadığı ve Kutsal Engizisyon tarafından menedilen nesneler kategorisine girmeyen her şeye el koyabilirsin. Benim {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}derdim{/d} Emelina'yı benimle irtibata geçmeye zorlayan sorun her neyse o. Dünyanın zenginlikleri değil."
